query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `career_page_sections` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `page_id` int NOT NULL,
  `section_type` enum('hero','about','values','team','gallery','benefits','testimonials','cta','video','stats','culture','custom') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255),
  `subtitle` text,
  `content` text,
  `layout` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'default',
  `background_color` varchar(7),
  `text_color` varchar(7),
  `image_url` text,
  `video_url` text,
  `data` json,
  `cta_text` varchar(100),
  `cta_url` varchar(500),
  `sort_order` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `is_visible` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `career_page_sections_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)
